command: rg -n "No credentials in code|Rotate credentials regularly|Secrets managed" SECURITY.md
if rg -n "credentials_json|secrets\.GCP_SA_KEY_API" .github/workflows/ci.yml; then echo "static-key-path-present"; exit 1; else echo "static-key-path-absent"; fi
rg -n "No credentials in code|Rotate credentials regularly|Secrets managed" SECURITY.md
